Name: Elect_Identifier
Description: Equipment identifier

Name: Elect_Delivered_Low_1
Description: Meter Reading electricity delivered to client (low tariff) in 0,001 kWh

Name: Elect_Delivered_Normal_1
Description: Meter Reading electricity delivered to client (normal tariff) in 0,001 kWh

Name: Elect_Delivered_Low_2
Description: Meter Reading electricity delivered by client (low tariff) in 0,001 kWh

Name: Elect_Delivered_Normal_2
Description: Meter Reading electricity delivered by client (normal tariff) in 0,001 kWh

Name: Tariff_Indicator
Description: Tariff indicator electricity. The tariff indicator can be used to switch tariff

Name: Dependent_Loads
Description: dependent loads e.g boilers. This is responsibility of the P1 user

Name: Actual_Deliverd
Description: Actual electricity power delivered (+P) in 1 Watt resolution

Name: Actual_Received
Description: Actual electricity power received (-P) in 1 Watt resolution

Name: Power_Failures
Description: Number of power failures in any phases

Name: Power_Failures_Long
Description: Number of long power failures in any phases

Name: Power_Failure_log
Description: Power failure event log

Name: L1_Voltage_Sags
Description: Number of voltage sags in phase L1

Name: L2_Voltage_Sags
Description: Number of voltage sags in phase L2

Name: L3_Voltage_Sags
Description: Number of voltage sags in phase L3

Name: L1_Voltage_Swells
Description: Number of voltage swells in phase L1

Name: L2_Voltage_Swells
Description: Number of voltage swells in phase L2

Name: L3_Voltage_Swells
Description: Number of voltage swells in phase L3

Name: L1_Voltage
Description: Instantaneous voltage L1

Name: L2_Voltage
Description: Instantaneous voltage L2

Name: L3_Voltage
Description: Instantaneous voltage L3

Name: L1_Current
Description: Instantaneous current L1

Name: L2_Current
Description: Instantaneous current L2

Name: L3_Current
Description: Instantaneous current L3

Name: L1_Power+P
Description: Instantaneous active power L1 (+P)

Name: L2_Power+P
Description: Instantaneous active power L2 (+P)

Name: L3_Power+P
Description: Instantaneous active power L3 (+P)

Name: L1_Power-P
Description: Instantaneous active power L1 (-P)

Name: L2_Power-P
Description: Instantaneous active power L2 (-P)

Name: L3_Power-P
Description: Instantaneous active power L3 (-P)

Name: Message
Description: Text message max 1024 characters

Name: Gas_Device_Type_n
Description: Device-Type For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Gas_Identifier_n
Description: Equipment identifier For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Gas_Delivered_n
Description: Last 5-minute value (temperature converted) For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4], gas delivered to client in m3, including decimal values and capture time

Name: Thermal_Device_Type_n
Description: Device-Type  For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Thermal_Identifier_n
Description: Equipment identifier  For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Thermal_Reading_n
Description: Last 5-minute Meter reading Heat or Cold in 0,01 GJ and capture time  For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Water_Device_Type_n
Description: Device-Type For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Water_Identifier_n
Description: Equipment identifier For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Water_Delivered_n
Description: Last 5-minute Meter reading in 0,001 m3 and capture time  For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Mbus_Device_Type_n
Description: Device-Type For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Mbus_Identifier_n
Description: Equipment identifier For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]

Name: Mbus_Delivered_n
Description: Last 5-minute Meter reading and capture time  For Channel n, n in [1, 2, 3, 4]
